```{r RegTab, results = 'asis', fig.align = "center", out.width = "\\textwidth",echo=F, warning=FALSE}

Natural <- data.frame(
  Variable  = c("InstalledPV",  "HousePrice", "SizeHouse", " ConstructYear", "SizeRooftop"),
  Model_1 = "x",
  Model_2 = " ",
  Model_3 = "x")
end1 <- nrow(Natural)

Imaginaries <- data.frame(
  Variable  = c("VerkiezingUitslag"),
  Model_1 = " ",
  Model_2 = "x",
  Model_3 = "x")
s2 <- end1 +1
end2 <- nrow(Imaginaries) +end1

Context <- data.frame(
  Variable  = c("Ownership", "DistrHeat", "ResidentMobility","Income"),
  Model_1 = "x",
  Model_2 = "x",
  Model_3 = "x")

s3 <- end2 + 1


i <-  bind_rows(Natural, Imaginaries, Context)
end3 <- nrow(i)

kable(
i,
 "latex", 
caption = "parameters regression analysis", booktabs = T) %>% kable_styling() %>% 
group_rows("Natural resources", 1, end1) %>% 
group_rows("Imaginaries ", s2, end2) %>% 
group_rows("contextual parameters", s3, end3)
```
